## StringLiterals type

Helper type to convert string array into array of [IStringLiteralType](./tscgen.istringliteraltype.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type StringLiterals<T extends Readonly<string[]>> = {
    [P in keyof T]: T[P] extends string ? IStringLiteralType<T[P]> : never;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [IStringLiteralType](./tscgen.istringliteraltype.md)
